content: प्रज्वल् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To burn brightly, blaze up, shine; रणांगानि प्रजज्वलुः <ls>Bk. 14. 98.</ls> {@--2@} To catch fire, be in flames, blaze up. {@--3@} To be kindled (as anger), to be incensed or wrathful. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (°ज्व-ज्वा-लयति) {@--1@} To kindle, set on fire. {@--2@} To brighten, illumine, irradiate.
